_header: Sweet Jesu where was thy guilt
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A prayer to Jesus — in quatrains

Lam78.Transcription:
Swete ihesu hwat was thy gyltto suffre so moche wo for meThy
                    body to harde panys I putand al to drawe up on a treeffeet and hondys
                    I naylyd fastihesu thy paynys weryn smertAt ȝet for me were at
                    the lastewyth spere I stonge to the hertSwete ihesu harde were thy
                    paynysthat thow on cros me sufferyst sorethat I the haue gylt a
                    ȝensfor ȝeue me lord I nel no more
